data.description:
Z-Race is a zero-gravity, VR racing game packed with atomic physics, spectacular effects, and innovative gameplay mechanics!
Intuitive controls and motion design create a game that provides the racer with little-to-no motion sickness, allowing absolutely anyone to play. The multiplayer experience in Z-Race is designed to assure you’ll always have competitive opponents to play against, and not be stuck with ones that are too slow—or too fast—for your skill level. No matter how good you get at flying Formula Z, you’ll never be alone. The faster you are, the more competitive your rivals will become. A demo of our new Tournament mode in AppLab will allow you to experience the world of VR arcade racing and compete for real prizes.
Features:
● Beautiful, high-quality graphics
● Specially designed to be comfortable to play, with no motion sickness
● Innovative, simple controls
● Asynchronous multiplayer

changelog.change_log:
--GamePatch--1.0.11--

Major

* The Sneak Team Tournament has begun!
* The pause option is now available again

--GamePatch--1.0.1--

Minor
*Added the after game menu animations
*Added the before game menu animations
*Some fixes

--GamePatch--0.3.32--

Major party mode updates
*4 game modes for a Party Mode:
- Slipstream
- Total nitro
- Total nitro charges
- Total slow-mo charges

--GamePatch--0.3.30--

Minor
* Fixed the position tracker during the game
* From now on, in the main menu, when you hover over the screen, the car will become transparent to prevent information from being displaying

--GamePatch--0.3.30.2--

Minor
* Fixed a lot of issues with the multiplayer game

--GamePatch--0.3.30--

Minor
* Fixed the position tracker during the game
* From now on, in the main menu, when you hover over the screen, the car will become transparent to prevent information from being displaying

Major

* The 2nd stage of the AppLab CUP has begun!
* Added a BETA of the "Party mode".
* A brand new track "Deep Racing*'

Minor
* From now on, the nicknames are displayed on top of the environment

Minor
